column3: Latest; Kompong Thom: At 5:30 pm on November 16
column4: 2019 in Kampong Thom province’s Staung District
column5: a suspect was arrested for ------kidnapping a child------ in Pursat. ------The woman has been named as  Thun Thorn
column6: 29.------The whereabouts of the young girl are not made clear in the report.------ ------POST NEWS------UPDATE: According to a Facebook post (below)
column7: the missing girl has been taken to police in Kampot after she was sold by the suspect (reportedly for $10
column8: 000 EDIT: Another report puts the figure at $200).------UPDATE: CPU have contacted us to say the child was found in Kampot province and has now been returned to her parents.
